description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中共元老及解放军高级将领何长工之子。曾任共青团中央书记处书记、国家旅游局局长、第十一届及第十二届全国政协常务委员。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, and the son of He Changgong, a veteran of the Communist Party of China and a senior general of the People's Liberation Army. He has served as Secretary of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, Director of the National Tourism Administration, and a Standing Committee member of the 11th and 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老，中国人民解放军高级将领，曾任第五届全国政协副主席。
description.en: A veteran of the Communist Party of China, a senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and served as the Vice Chairman of the 5th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国湖南省岳阳市下辖县，是何光𬀩的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yueyang City, Hunan Province, China, and the birthplace of He Guangwei.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于东亚的社会主义国家，何光𬀩是其政治人物。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, of which He Guangwei is a political figure.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下的中国基本人民团体之一。
description.en: One of the basic people's organizations in China under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的直属机构，负责管理旅游业。
description.en: A former agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing the tourism industry.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 电影投资人，何光𬀩之子，何长工之孙。
description.en: Film investor, son of He Guangwei, and grandson of He Changgong.

description.zh-cn: 何刚的妻子。因在社交媒体发布其于故宫闭馆日驾车进入的照片而引发“女子开车进故宫事件”，造成广泛社会争议。
description.en: Wife of He Gang. She caused widespread social controversy by posting photos on social media of her driving into the Forbidden City on a closing day, leading to the 'woman driving into the Forbidden City' incident.

description.zh-cn: 指高露在社交媒体上发布其于故宫闭馆日开奔驰车进入的照片，引发公众舆论争议的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident in which Gao Lu posted photos on social media of her driving a Mercedes-Benz into the Forbidden City on a closing day, sparking public controversy.

description.zh-cn: 忠旺集团创始人。其妻子Wang Zhijie名下的一处房产与“女子开车进故宫事件”的主角高露有关联。
description.en: Founder of Zhongwang Group. A property under his wife Wang Zhijie's name is associated with Gao Lu, the protagonist of the 'woman driving into the Forbidden City' incident.

description.zh-cn: 由刘忠田创办的公司。
description.en: A company founded by Liu Zhongtian.

description.zh-cn: 刘忠田的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Liu Zhongtian.

description.zh-cn: 何光𬀩是何长工之子。
description.en: He Guangwei is the son of He Changgong.

description.zh-cn: 何光𬀩1944年4月出生于湖南华容。
description.en: He Guangwei was born in Huarong, Hunan in April 1944.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 1981年8月，担任第十届共青团中央书记处书记，1982年12月连任第十一届。1986年转任国家旅游局。
description.en: In August 1981, he served as Secretary of the Secretariat of the 10th Central Committee of the Communist Youth League, and was re-elected to the 11th Central Committee in December 1982. He was transferred to the National Tourism Administration in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 1981年8月，担任全国青年联合会副主席。
description.en: In August 1981, he served as Vice Chairman of the All-China Youth Federation.

description.zh-cn: 1986年担任国家旅游局副局长，1995年至2005年3月升任局长。
description.en: He served as Deputy Director of the National Tourism Administration in 1986, and was promoted to Director from 1995 to March 2005.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年3月当选第十一届全国政协常务委员，2013年3月当选第十二届全国政协委员会常务委员。
description.en: In March 2008, he was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, and in March 2013, he was elected as a Standing Committee member of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 何刚是何光𬀩的儿子。
description.en: He Gang is the son of He Guangwei.

description.zh-cn: 高露是何刚的妻子（儿媳）。
description.en: Gao Lu is the wife of He Gang (daughter-in-law).

description.zh-cn: 高露因驾车进入故宫并发布照片而引发广泛争议。
description.en: Gao Lu caused widespread controversy by driving into the Forbidden City and posting photos.

description.zh-cn: Wang Zhijie是刘忠田的妻子。
description.en: Wang Zhijie is the wife of Liu Zhongtian.
